name: School of Nightmare
description:
School Nightmares is a 3D horror game in which you have to collect all 6 notebook assignments that is alphabet questions, but be careful, the teacher is behind you. So, you don't have the time to answer the question, you have to take all 6 notebook assignments without answering them. The teacher doesn't like when you quickly collecting those instead of answering the question carefully. Keep your heads up, there's two students that are not your friend. And sadly, there is no school principal to check up on you and others. You think you can beat this game? 

Thanks you for your supporting, and have a great time.
